name: Inappropiate Laughter
description:
A game that is still very early in development.

Mostly something that exists to vent out creative energy, write silly dialog and learn how to code.

It's the first thing resembling a "big" project I ever started.

It's a story about witnessing the weird, charming(?) and disturbing nature of the Void, that may or may not house a secret within.

LOUD SOUND AND FLASHING IMAGES WARNING
